metadata.synopsis: A reaction to a dead avatar moving an item/touching them.

0.speaker: Astarion
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yelp/jump of surprise, then looking around himNodeContext: Yelp of surprise, looking around him - player's ghost just touched Astarion or moved something near him.

1.speaker: Astarion
1.text: Ah! Was that-... No. Probably just my mind playing tricks.
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Yelp/jump of surprise, then looking around himNodeContext: Yelp of surprise, looking around him - player's ghost just touched Astarion or moved something near him.
